string-array.item: Due to moving , We are selling a luxurious 7 seater Sofa set very good condition and hardly used.Price is 500,000 Rwf.
The 2 bedrooms and 3 bedroom apartment fully furnished apartments are located in secured neighborhood in Gacuriro upper Wood land junction and each\'s rented at 1,000$ and 1,300$ respectively
Manufactured in 1998 Model: Toyota Prado Imported from Belgium Fuel type : Diesel Color : green Number Plate : RAD
